column4: i need help setting up my phone in Bitpim, when i lsusb in terminal i get: Bus 001 Device 005: ID 1004:6000 LG Electronics, Inc. VX4400/VX6000 Cellphone  but the phone cant get detected in Bitpim?
can you manually add it in bitpim? i dont exactly remember how to do it....
it seems when i try to add the phone manually in Bitpim, i can see the phone, but it says the port is active but not available for use
interesting, i dont have much experience with that, the only time i used bitpim was when i was in windows and i used a bluetooth virtual serial port
